original_title: さむくないかい GARO VIDEO第6弾
overview: Kameichiro is a 40-year-old virgin who is ridiculed by the people around him. He goes the wild encounters to try to get laid, inspired by the wild culture of garo comics and made by one of the biggest artists in the movement Takashi Nemoto. With cameo of cannibal Issei Sagawa.
title: Garo Video 6: Isn't it cold?
